name: Stuffy
author: Elaine Mical
summary: Ooooooh, is this a tasty way to use-up some of the leftover turkey and dressing.
ingredients: ¼ cup mayonnaise, or to taste
1 cup leftover roast turkey meat, shredded
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread mayonnaise on each half of the split hoagie rolls
Layer 1/4 cup turkey, 1/4 cup stuffing, 2 tablespoons gravy, and 2 tablespoons cranberry sauce on each of the four hoagie halves
Top each sandwich with the remaining 4 pieces of bread
Wrap each sandwich in aluminum foil and place in the oven for 15 minutes or until the sandwiches are heated through
